section.title: Digital products for a better world
section.description: We use the best available technology to help your ideas have the impact they deserve.

webapp.title: Web Applications and Websites
webapp.description: Crafting beautiful, lightning-fast Web applications and websites. We focus on a user-centric design with enhanced performance and optimized SEO, from MVP to full-scale production-ready products.

mobileapp.title: Native and Hybrid Mobile Apps
mobileapp.description: User-centric iOS and Android apps that drive engagement. We build native and hybrid mobile apps that are fast, reliable and secure with a great attention to details.

data.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
data.description: We can help you to extract value and discover new insights from your data. This includes the implementation of systems for automated data processing and visualization, as well as data analysis and machine learning deployment. We also specialize in the latest privacy-enhancing techniques to ensure data can be processed, safely, while sensitive information remains protected.

backend.title: Backend Services
backend.description: Our team excels in server-side development, database management, and API integration, ensuring your application is secure, scalable, and high-performing. We apply best practices in server management, cloud services, and security to support seamless data flow. Whether optimizing existing infrastructure or building a new backend, we ensure your systems are resilient and growth-ready.

contact.title: Contact
contact.contactDescription: Have a question or want to work together? Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.successDescription: We'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorDescription: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later or contact us via LinkedIn.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Our innovative solutions for modern challenges
projects.description:
We believe in harnessing the power of technology and creativity to drive positive change.

Our projects are dedicated to addressing social, environmental, and community challenges with sustainable and innovative solutions.

From empowering local communities to creating platforms for environmental advocacy, we are committed to building a better world for everyone. Together, let's turn ideas into actions that make a real difference

bluekomune.title: Full Stack Web application for ocean experts collaboration
bluekomune.company: Blue Komune - Platform for ocean experts collaboration
bluekomune.description: Development of a web application from scratch for ocean experts collaboration, with a focus on ease of use and engagement. The AI search engine enables users to find projects and experts in a powerful manner.
bluekomune.features: Authentication, instant and direct messaging, instant search engine, map integration, customlive video calls with recordings, AI call transcription, server components and responsive design.
bluekomune.challenges: Blue Komune needed a fully featured and AI-powered web application with an engaging user experience to connect experts and projects related to ocean conservation as efficiently as possible.
bluekomune.solutions: We chose the most innovative and popular tech available to build a cutting-edge product. The latest webRTC technology for the video calls and AI for the call transcription and analysis allowed us to deliver a product that met the highest standards of quality and user experience.

bridgeforbillions.title: Redesign of a complex web application for full responsiveness
bridgeforbillions.company: Bridge For Billions - Online entrepreneurship programs
bridgeforbillions.features: Mobile-friendly version of the website, more than fifty pages adapted, common structure for every new page
bridgeforbillions.description: Give access to the platform to people in remote areas of the world without access to a computer, by developing a mobile-friendly version of the website.
bridgeforbillions.challenges: The React application was not responsive at all and used complex graphs and visual elements that required a full redesign.
bridgeforbillions.solutions: We adapted more than fifty pages to make the web application fully responsive and created a common structure for every new page to ensure consistency and ease of use in the future.

edumiam.title: Backend and database full restructuration
edumiam.company: Edumiam - Training courses for early childhood professionals
edumiam.features: PostgreSQL database hosted on Supabase backend, database triggers and automations, Forest Admin panel, Python script for data migration and business algorithms.
edumiam.description: Migration of the existing application to a scalable and structured database and backend, with the addition of new features and improvements in the internal processes of the company.
edumiam.challenges: Unstructured, heavy data stored in Airtable and Excel, with inefficient internal processes done manually.
edumiam.solutions: Meticulous data migration from Airtable and Excel to a PostgreSQL database hosted on Supabase in several phases, with the addition of triggers and automations to ensure data consistency and integrity. Creation of a Python script to automate the business algorithms to optimize the internal processes of the company.

reusam.title: Digitalization of a Reusable Packaging Service
reusam.features: MVP with Adalo no-code platform, native mobile applications for Android and iOS, backend architecture developed using Python, Django framework and MySQL, Website improvements.
reusam.description: Reusa'm is an innovative reusable packaging deposit service operating in Valencia. It aims to reduce environmental impact by encouraging businesses and customers to use reusable containers. We helped Reusa'm transition from a manual deposit system to a fully digital platform, providing users with a streamlined experience to rent, track, and return containers efficiently.
reusam.challenges: Reusa'm originally operated with a manual deposit system, requiring significant user and employee effort. The challenge was to design a seamless, digital solution that could scale with the growing network of businesses and improve the efficiency of the deposit-return cycle.
reusam.solutions: We led the digital transformation by developing a no-code web app to validate the service and gauge user needs. From there, we built two native mobile applications (iOS and Android) using a backend powered by Django framework and MySQL, allowing for easy container management via QR code technology. Credit card integration ensured automated deposits and returns, making the system more scalable and user-friendly.

crn.title: Cervical cancer risk prediction
crn.description: Predicting the development of cervical cancer based on individual screening histories. This allows for faster intervention for individuals with higher risk, while reducing the number of examinations for individuals with lower risk.
crn.features: We aimed to explore the performance of deep learning models on screening history data, which consists of a sequence of health examinations over long time intervals.
crn.challenges: Screening intervals are 3 years on average, resulting in sparse data and limited information available per individual over long time periods. This makes it hard to predict what will happen in the future.
crn.solutions: Trained multiple variants of recurrent neural networks (RNN, LSTM and GRU) on screening history data. Subsequently, we investigated the model performance across populations by comparing the prediction results between Norwegian and Estonian screening data.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say
testimonials.henrik: I worked with the Dev for Good Collective for years. They consistently delivered great work with an eye for quality and design. They are proactive, see opportunities, and you can trust them to do what's needed to get the job done.
testimonials.jaime: The collective was hired to make our React-based web application fully responsive using Ant Design. Their attention to detail, clear communication, and punctuality were remarkable. Our users continue to benefit from the improvements they successfully implemented.
testimonials.kyrre: I've had the pleasure of working with this team over several years, and they are competent, hard-working, honest and delightful to work with. Your project will be safe in the hands of a team that really cares about doing great work. My warmest recommendations.
testimonials.vincent: Alexandre and Stefano brought exceptional technical expertise, designing a solid architecture while consistently delivering high-quality code at speed. Their creativity and adaptability were crucial to meeting the dynamic needs of our startup.

team.title: Who we are
team.description: Friends and developers for 8+ years, we combine our complementary skills for impact.

1.title: Complementary skills
1.description: We are four developers with complementary backgrounds in software engineering, Web development, mobile apps and data science. We can take your idea and build a complete production-ready product from scratch or help you improve and automate an existing service, so you can focus on what matters most.

2.title: Purpose driven
2.description: Our collective was built on the belief that our work should align with our values. We carefully choose projects that resonate with our commitment to creating meaningful change, ensuring that every line of code we write serves a greater purpose.

3.title: Smooth communication
3.description: Having worked together for years, we've developed a seamless collaboration that makes us highly efficient and organized. When you partner with us, you can trust that we'll listen carefully to your needs while also bringing fresh ideas to the table.
